name: iOS 16.4 and iPadOS 16.4
available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access information about a user’s contacts
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A user may gain access to protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Importing a maliciously crafted calendar invitation may exfiltrate user information
advisories.description: Multiple validation issues were addressed with improved input sanitization.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A sandboxed app may be able to determine which app is currently using the camera
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with additional restrictions on the observability of app states.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A user in a privileged network position may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Itay Iellin of General Motors Product Cyber Security

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to read arbitrary files
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted Bluetooth packet may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Jianjun Dai and Guang Gong of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing a font file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Parsing a maliciously crafted plist may lead to an unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A file from an iCloud shared-by-me folder may be able to bypass Gatekeeper
advisories.description: This was addressed with additional checks by Gatekeeper on files downloaded from an iCloud shared-by-me folder.

cves.credit: Jubaer Alnazi of TRS Group of Companies

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access information about a user’s contacts
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Processing an image may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A user may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed through improved input validation.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An attacker that has already achieved kernel code execution may be able to bypass kernel memory mitigations
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app with root privileges may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

cves.credit: Félix Poulin-Bélanger and David Pan Ogea

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Files downloaded from the internet may not have the quarantine flag applied
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher, Brandon Dalton (@partyD0lphin) of Red Canary, Milan Tenk, and Arthur Valiev of F-Secure Corporation

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A person with physical access to an iOS device may be able to view the last image used in Magnifier from the lock screen
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by restricting options offered on a locked device.

cves.credit: Abhay Kailasia (@abhay_kailasia) of Lakshmi Narain College Of Technology Bhopal

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A user in a privileged network position may be able to spoof a VPN server that is configured with EAP-only authentication on a device
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved authentication.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Photos belonging to the Hidden Photos Album could be viewed without authentication through Visual Lookup
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to unexpectedly create a bookmark on the Home Screen
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A shortcut may be able to use sensitive data with certain actions without prompting the user
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with additional permissions checks.

cves.credit: Jubaer Alnazi Jabin of TRS Group Of Companies, and Wenchao Li and Xiaolong Bai of Alibaba Group

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: A denial-of-service issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Content Security Policy to block domains with wildcards may fail
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Gertjan Franken of imec-DistriNet, KU Leuven

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: hazbinhotel working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may lead to address bar spoofing
advisories.description: A spoofing issue existed in the handling of URLs. This issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS released before iOS 15.7.
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Georgy Kucherin (@kucher1n), Leonid Bezvershenko (@bzvr_), Boris Larin (@oct0xor), and Valentin Pashkov of Kaspersky

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may bypass Same Origin Policy
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A website may be able to track sensitive user information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed by removing origin information.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may lead to address bar spoofing
advisories.description: A spoofing issue existed in the handling of URLs. This issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing a file may lead to a denial-of-service or potentially disclose memory contents
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved state management.
